sub_title: 🇧🇩🇳🇱| Environmental Impact Analyst, Data Scientist & Consultant | Geoscience & Infrastructure Specialist | Sustainability Researcher | TU Ambassador 🌍🔍🌱
summary:
🌍 Geoscience Enthusiast | Sustainability Advocate | Policy Advisor | Engineer 🛠️

I am sustainability enthusiast, with a background in Atmospheric and Geosciences, with a passion for making a positive impact on our environment and society. My academic journey has been shaped by a deep interest in Geosciences, Environmental Impact Assessments, and Engineering, where I've honed my skills and knowledge.

📚 Academic Qualifications:

🎓 Applied Earth Sciences, Geo-Engineering, Atmospheric Sciences, Aerospace, Minor Electrical Engineering
🎓 Project Management
🎓 Mineralogy, Sedimentalogy, Sustainable Aviation.
🌟 Specialization in EIA and LCA Analysis.
🌱 Professional Experience - Sustainability (Last 5 Years):

🌿 Former Chair of Lijst Bèta, Central Student Council, Delft University of Technology (Portfolio: Sustainability)
🌿 Entrepreneur in the realms of Education and Market Analysis.
🌿 Former National (Dutch) Coordinator of Sustainability for Green Offices.
🌿 Secretary and Coordinator in the Energy sector, contributing to civic and social organizations (Eg. TU Delft Green Office)


📊 Skills:

💻 Proficient in Python, openLCA, Adobe Illustrator, Canva, Overleaf and Design Thinking.
📈 Experienced in project management and technical management.
📝 Skilled in writing, editing, and curriculum development.
🌐 Strong background in project coordination and outreach.
🌏 Committed to sustainability and environmental initiatives.
📊 Knowledgeable in Matlab, Python, and statistical analysis.

🎓 Leadership & Student Involvement:

🎓 Served as Chair of the Central Student Council Party at TU Delft, advocating for student representation in education, sustainability, and diversity & inclusion.
🎓 Actively involved in university policy analysis and international student representation.
🎓 Coordinator for education and market analysis platforms.

🌟 Passion & Vision:
My journey is driven by a passion for addressing global challenges and promoting sustainability. I have a strong affinity for development projects in Bangladesh and other developing nations, and I'm dedicated to contributing to their success.

🤝 Let's Connect:
I'm always eager to collaborate, share insights, and explore opportunities that align with my areas of expertise and interests. Feel free to reach out, and let's work towards a more sustainable and inclusive future together!

#Geoscience #Sustainability #Engineering #DiversityAndInclusion #Leadership #PolicyAdvisor

profile_positions.description: Responsible to work with the TU Delft official Communications department to be an ambassador to an assigned Faculty (in my case Faculty of Civil Engineering & Geosciences) to assist prospective and incoming students from all over the world to understand the faculty, education, university and life in the Netherlands better and to have a Good Start which can contribute to a less stressful beginning and a more promising student well-being.
profile_positions.title: Ambassador

profile_positions.description: Working on assessing the plastic footprint of different products and materials, using LCA and EIA, and models, developing a new Plastic Footprint Calculator to be used for future clients and projects, research on EU Climate Action reports and US databases.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Impact Assessor

profile_positions.description: Our startup extracts carbon fiber from wind turbine blades to create usable carbon fiber sheets for repurposing and recycling, reducing waste in landfills and supporting sustainable practices in the industry. The startup is addressing the problem of wind turbine blade waste by extracting high-quality carbon fiber and repurposing it into usable carbon fiber sheets for other industries, reducing the amount of waste that ends up in landfills and supporting sustainable practices in the industry. This innovative solution helps to address the environmental impact of wind energy while creating a valuable resource for other industries. Our proposed solution is to extract carbon fiber from wind turbine blades and transform it into usable carbon fiber sheets for other industries. By repurposing these materials, we can reduce the amount of waste that ends up in landfills and create a sustainable source of carbon fiber for other industries to use. This innovative process supports sustainable practices in the industry and addresses the environmental impact of wind energy.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: An initiative by a group of young people to help the students and early career professionals of Bangladesh and beyond through connecting them with the experts of the relevant fields. The field I am focusing on is Sustainability, Environment Management and Climate Action, in the context of Bangladesh and developing countries.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: After a full-time as the Chair of Lijst Bèta Faction Central Student Council, I am selected to be the President at the Lijst Bèta Association/Board partime for the coming year to help with promotions, management and overseeing.
